properties.script:
import sys
import json

data = json.loads(sys.argv[1])

response_list = []

for k, v in data['teams_observables'].items():
    response_list.append({'key': k, 'value': v})

output = json.dumps({'data': response_list})
sent_by = data['sent_by']['name']
